sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './CheckoutItem.styles.scss' import { removeItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem, removeItemFromCart, removeItem, addItem}) => { const {name, imageUrl, price, quantity} = cartItem return (
{name}
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 {price}
removeItemFromCart(cartItem)}>✕
)} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ removeItemFromCart: item => dispatch(removeItemFromCart(item)), addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem: item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
